## Stainless Steel Collars Purchase Opportunity

### Summary

Public Works and Government Services Canada invites you to submit a proposal for the procurement of Stainless Steel Collars. This project is conditionally limited to Canadian goods and services.

### Project Details

* Contracting Party: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* Contracting Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User: Natural Resources Canada
* End User Address: 580 Booth St, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0E4, Canada
* Project Location: Northern Forestry Centre, Edmonton, AB
* Project Description: To manufacture, deliver, and install Stainless Steel collars for fume hood chimney stack applications.
* Total Quantity: 1 unit of each
* Delivery Date: On or before March 31, 2023
* Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tenders
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Documentation Language: English and French

### Tender Submission Requirements

* Electronic submissions are encouraged using the Canada Post Corporation's Connect service.
* Fax submissions will be accepted at 418-566-6167.
* Hard copy submissions will not be accepted.
* For more information on remote submission options, please send an email to roreceptionSoumissions.wrbidreceiving@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Important Information

* Temporary social distancing measures are in place at the Western Region Bid Receiving Unit.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either English or French. Given current circumstances and network limitations, some active procurements may be delayed. To stay up to date on the status of specific procurements, please consult Buysandsell.gc.ca.

### Proposal Evaluation

The lowest price proposal received will be the basis for contract award. Submissions must be received by 4:00 PM MDT on November 24, 2022.

To find out more and download the tender documents, please refer to the link provided below:

* [Canada Bid Opportunities](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/access-to-information/prioritized-budget-plans) 

Please contact Andrew Hemy for more information at (403) 463-6589 or andrew.hemy@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca.
